title: Ashley Furniture Signature Design - Brashland Dresser - White
description: The Ashley Furniture Signature Design - Brashland Dresser in White is a stunning addition to any bedroom. This dresser combines rustic charm with modern functionality, featuring a white-textured rub-through finish that enhances its elegant look. With seven spacious drawers, it offers ample storage for all your clothing and accessories. The drawers are designed with dovetail construction and ball bearing glides for smooth and easy operation. Crafted from engineered wood and veneers, this dresser is built to last. Its timeless design and practical features make it a perfect choice for any bedroom.
meta_title: Ashley Furniture Signature Design - Brashland Dresser - White
meta_description: Purchase the Ashley Furniture Signature Design - Brashland Dresser in White. Enjoy rustic charm, modern functionality, and ample storage. Perfect for any bedroom.
